item.title: Two JW Marriott hotels have been ranked in the top 10 TripAdvisor Travelers' Choices for Korea
item.description: Source: TripAdvisor website. The Lotte Hotel Seoul. TripAdvisor’s 2015 Travelers’ Choice Awards for hotels in Korea ranked the following as the top ten: Lotte Hotel Seoul, with a rating of 4.5 out of 5 from 1,849 reviews. The Plaza Conrad Seoul JW Marriott Dongdaemun Square Seoul Park Hyatt Seoul The Shilla Seoul Sheraton Seoul D Cube City Hotel The Westin Chosun Seoul The Ritz-Carlton, Seoul The JW Marriott Seoul Curious?
